tool_description: This API allows you to search for individuals in USA, use a name, phone number or email for search. Retrieve address, phone number, email and other valuable public records from US public records database
name: USA People Search - Public Records
title: USA People Search - Public Records

api_list.name: Email Search
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search by email address

api_list.name: Phone Search
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search by a phone number

api_list.name: Name Search
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search by name. State is opotional
